name: Amber
title: Gliding Champion
description: As the only remaining Outrider of the Knights of Favonius, she is always ready to help the citizens of Mondstadt â€” whether it be something simple or perhaps a more challenging task.

skills.name: Sharpshooter
skills.description: Normal Attack: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow. Charged Attack: Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG. Plunging Attack: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Explosive Puppet
skills.description: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage. Baron Bunny: Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire. Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP. When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. Hold: Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny. The longer the button is held, the further the throw.

skills.name: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.name: Gliding Champion
passives.description: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.name: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.name: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it. Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description: Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.
